contents.item: With ordinary talent and extraordinary perseverance  all things are attainable.

For me  at least  there came moments when faith wavered. But there is the great lesson and the great triumph: keep the fire burning until  by and by  out of the mass of sordid details there comes some result.

Nothing in the world can take place of persistence. Talent will not  nothing is more common than unsuccessful individuals with talent. Genius will not  unrewarded genius is almost a proverb. Education will not  the world is full of educated derelicts. Persistence and determination alone are omnipotent.
Let me tell you the secret that has led me to my goal: my strength lies solely in my tenacity.
In the game of life nothing is less important than the score at half time.
In the realm of ideas everything depends on enthusiasm  in the real world  all rests on perseverance.
Without perseverance talent is a barren bed.
Don't be discouraged. It's often the last key in the bunch that opens the lock.
Dear God  I pray for patience. And I want it right now!
If you can keep your head when all about you are losing theirs  it's just possible you haven't grasped the situation.
The way I see it  if you want the rainbow  you gotta put up with the rain.
I am extraordinarily patient  provided I get my own way in the end.
If you want your ship to come in  you must build a dock.
By perseverance the snails reached the ark.
Hope: A pathological belief in the occurrence of the impossible.
Do not free a camel of the burden of his hump  you may be freeing him from being a camel.
Experience is a hard teacher. She gives the test first  the lesson afterwards.
Ideas are a dime a dozen. People who put them into action are priceless.
As an entrepreneur  I am often asked how I kept my perseverance. Well  persevere comes from the Latin roots purse  as in "money " and sever  as in "cut off." That's why I persevered.
Perseverance is not a long race  it is many short races  one after another.
